title: An poor app for what could be a great product
text:
How can a company selling a very expensive floor heating thermostat come up with such limited app that does not offer the features to control your floor heating?
I could not find a way to create or modify a schedule or program except changing the temperatures fora specific time.
It would be much better to have a representation of your thermostat and all controls at your fingertips.
When you charge so much for a thermostat, you owe your customers an App that supports it appropriately.

title: It just doesn’t work, and is borderline dangerous
text: The app has trouble connecting to the thermostat but even when it says it’s connected it’s not actually communicating. If all of that wasn’t bad enough, it’ll pretend like the change you made has been received when it actually hasn’t been. In my case I’m simply trying to enable and disable “away mode”. Often it looks like the change has been made to the thermostat and I only realize later (sometimes days later) that the change wasn’t received.  This can be costly, both with energy bills and even with safety in some circumstances. I feel like it’s borderline negligence for the app to even be published to the App Store with these issues. Thermostat controls need to be reliable.

title: Needs update
text:
The app and thermostat work reliably, but are in need of a feature update (or four).  Most importantly, there is no ability to lock the schedule program, so anyone that decides to play with it, can crank up the temp to maximum. 

There are so many features I would like to see and so much potential for this, but it is not worth the time.  Since the app has not been updated since early 2015, I think it is fair to assume Pentair/Nuheat have abandoned any future development on the app/thermostat.

title: Mind of its own
text: I have 5 of these thermostats for different zones in our basement.  I have them programmed to be off/low during the week days.  But during the weekdays, some of them will follow the weekend program (warmer floor temperature) instead of the weekday.  They are programmed properly, have the correct day and time but will not follow program properly.

title: Works, but limited temp range
text:
Installed this Tstat/app to control 220V electric heat on my roof. Ran the temp probe outside and planned to have the unit turn ON anytime the outside temp falls below freezing. Only problem is the lowest setting on the Tstat (and the app) is 41°F (5°C). Not sure why NuHeat would include this arbitrary lower limit - hope they fix it in next rev!

Also, there is no way to simply  turn Tstat on/off through the app - please add this feature!

title: App Instructions??
text: Are there any instructions specifically for the app? I’m trying to program a floor heating installation with a Signature thermostat with the app. I can’t find info about the “On”/“OFF” soft button on the temperature settings screen. Is it to turn off the setting or turn off the heating??? The 1st temp set line does not have the soft button....   This is why the app needs clear user instructions. The manual for the thermal has no info about the app.

title: Sufficient
text:
The older reviews saying schedule programming are not available seem to be out of date.  Linking account seemed to delete programming and I had to redo it.

Though this is not a 5-star app in terms of features, it is adequate.  I also am removing a star because the thermostat required email registration to get the wifi working.  This is an anti-privacy policy.

title: Good product
text: Got my Nu heat floor mat wifi thermostat about a month ago and I love it.  I had problems with the thermostat but the manufacturer replaced it immediately and I have had no issues at all. I am ready to switch out my two bathroom thermostats with the Nu heat wifi.  I would recommend this product.

title: Junk
text: Thermostat was fairly easy to install and program. It worked fine I until I shut it off for the summer months. When we tried to turn it back on in Oct  it wouldn’t reprogram. I hired an  electrician and he determined that it was the thermostat. I was finally able to get a call back at 4:30 am from Nuheat tech support in England. He went on to tell me they don’t sell in the US and it wasn’t their problem.

title: Terrible app
text: I have set up my account to operate two nvent signature thermostats in two bathrooms. When I pull up the app it gives me choices for one bathroom, hallway, office, showroom, a kitchen, bedrooms etc. But not two bathrooms. My account is set up for the two bath thermostats but I don’t have access to them through the horrible app .  Operating the thermostats from the iPhone app is impossible. I have to do it at the thermostat itself.

title: Seriously… no shut off/away/travel mode?
text: The only reason I wanted an app for this is to shut it off when we are away. It’s not like if I’m standing on my floor and thinking “I need it a few degrees warmer” I’m going to be too lazy to walk over to the thermostat to do that.

title: Just installed
text: You can change the temperature and schedule and check energy use.  Why no alerts?

title: Really bad
text: We paid to have the mat installed beneath our tile floor. I wasn’t expecting the thermostat or the app to be great but I wasn’t expecting them to be terrible either. They are both really bad. How is it not possible to simply shut the mat off? Hopefully whoever makes this thing can invest a few bucks in a better app.

title: Could be so much more
text: It works, but a few more features would make it super useful. I’d be awesome if you could set it to away mode for a period of time and a minimum safety temperature.

title: WAS a great app
text: Been using this app for years.  Worked very well.  Was a great aid when I forgot to lower thermostat temps before vacation.  Now the app does not display the same temp as the thermostat, even shows the heat is on when it isn’t and no longer has the Away Mode.  Tech support wasn’t able to figure it out either.

title: Absolutely awful
text: I just upgraded to Signature thermostat. The hardware is excellent, but this app is terrible. You can’t do anything. Account name, password, and just about every option has to be keyed in on the thermostat. Note that the website isn’t much better.

title: Crappy app for expensive thermostat
text:
Don’t buy Nuheat thermostats. 
They allow you to change temperatures of your floor heating only 4 times a day. The usability of the app is bare minimum.  

For such an expensive thermostat you need to have better features.

title: App crashes
text: Not sure what the issue is but the app crashes. I deleted the app and reinstalled it but it still crashes.

title: Very poor interface
text: Kind of like a program written by a high school student.  I’m taking back the device and finding something better, with a better app.

title: Functional but really boring and lacks features
text: Needs an update. Lacking MODERN features needed to make the experience better

title: Non function
text: This app stopped function after logging on the main screen is totally blank all black. It worked once but no more. Deleted app re-installed, same thing. Disappointed.

title: Please fix the bugs
text: This app has so much potential, and should be the perfect compliment to my Nuheat thermostats. But it crashes every time I try to view historical energy use. The app hasn’t been updated in 3 years. This doesn’t inspire confidence in Nuheat.

title: Could be better
text: Would be nice if it would include HomeKit support or more options rather than just works with Nest.

title: Stopped working after working great for 2 years
text: Needs an update

title: Login
text: Need to fix the app so you don’t have to enter emails and passwords every time you want to adjust the setting

title: App defective
text: Is there an update for the app? When I attempt to lower the temp and permanent hold, it does not work.

title: Needs improvement
text: Needs a feature in the app to return the controller to run its programs, if the controller is set to manual at the T-Stat.

title: App crashing
text: Just downloaded the app...when trying to sign in it keeps crashing...tried four times.

title: Crash
text:
Every time you select weekly energy use the app crashes and closes....booo
Please fix this bug!
Thanks in advance.

title: The only device I my setup that doesn’t support HomeKit
text: Needs to be fixed. 1 star until it’s not fixed.

title: Basic
text: Very basic app for what is an expensive thermostat.

title: Untrustworthy and uselessness
text:
Great product; horrible app.
Does not synch with TStat, and provides fantasy data.
Do not trust app is controlling TStat.

Away feature has disappeared.

Zero stars

title: Great stat, horrible app
text: Total BS!

title: Unacceptable period!!!
text: I’ve had this heated flooring and app for over 2.5yrs now. It’s worked via Wi-Fi maybe the first 9 months or so. Didn’t stay connected to the WiFi for some reason, although it’s in the same room, I switched internet providers a year and a half ago and after inputting the username password SEVERAL times it’s telling me “wrong password.” Even when it worked for us it was a pain to read/operate. Needs to be more intuitive. Please take the time to dress this thing up because it’s basically useless at this point and makes you look bad NuHeat!!!

title: Upgrading my life
text: I just hooked up my Signature thermostat to my existing Nuheat floor mat and I love it. Not only can I see the next 24hrs of weather right on the thermostat, but now I can control everything right from this app. I left work early yesterday and knew my floor heat wouldn't be kicked on yet so I just turned it on from the app. Sure enough when I got home it was toasty. Thank you Nuheat for yet another upgrade to my life.

title: Getting it!
text: This stat is the perfect way to upgrade our existing floor heating system- it's fully compatible so we are getting one ASAP.
